resources.string: I am mohd Haider , recently i have completed my bca from vbspu. I have strong foundation in programming languages throughout my studies I have good exposure on creating web applications I am involved in all phases of the project like developing testing and deploying Now I am going to tell you about my strength. I am a quick learner and hard working person I'm comfortable with both individual as well as team work and My weaknesses is sometimes I take a bit longer time to finish my task but I'm not comfortable until I finished That's all about me If you have any questions I'll be happy to answer you !
